TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DesignerAutoFormatCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public NotInheritable Class DesignerAutoFormatCollection Implements IList
public ref class DesignerAutoFormatCollection sealed : System::Collections::IList

summary.span: 代表控制項設計工具中的 物件集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects within a control designer.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別和任何衍生的類別定義屬性做為物件。The class and any derived class defines the property as a object. 控制項開發人員可以覆寫屬性衍生的控制項設計工具中加入自訂的自動格式化樣式，並返回視覺化設計工具中的支援格式的集合。Control developers can override the property in a derived control designer, add custom automatic formatting styles, and return the collection of supported formats to the visual designer. 集合會動態增加加入物件時。The collection dynamically increases as objects are added. 在此集合中的索引都以零為起始。Indexes in this collection are zero-based. 使用屬性來判斷多少的自動套用樣式格式為集合中。Use the property to determine how many automatic style formats are in the collection. 此外，使用方法和屬性來提供下列功能：Additionally, use the methods and properties to provide the following functionality: - 方法，將單一格式加入至集合。The method to add a single format to the collection. - 方法，將集合內的特定索引處的格式。The method to add a format at a particular index within the collection. - 方法來移除格式。The method to remove a format. - 方法移除特定索引處的格式。The method to remove the format at a particular index. - 方法，以判斷特定的格式是否已在集合中。The method to determine whether a particular format is already in the collection. - 方法來擷取的索引集合中的格式。The method to retrieve the index of a format within the collection. - 屬性來取得或設定在特定的索引，使用陣列標記法格式。The property to get or set the format at a particular index, using array notation. - 方法從集合中移除所有格式。The method to remove all formats from the collection. - 屬性來判斷集合中的格式數目。The property to determine the number of formats in the collection. - 方法來取得集合中的格式的位置。The method to get the position of a format within the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作自訂控制項設計工具中的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the property in a custom control designer. 衍生的控制項設計工具實作屬性加上三個自訂的自動格式，衍生自執行個體類別。The derived control designer implements the property by adding three instances of a custom automatic format that are derived from the class. [!code-csharp[DesignerAutoFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerAutoFormat/CS/DesignerAutoFormat.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DesignerAutoFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerAutoFormat/VB/DesignerAutoFormat.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性通常用來逐一查看集合中的物件時決定上限索引。The property typically is used to determine the upper boundary index when iterating through objects in the collection. 第一個項目集合的索引是以零為起始的因為是在索引`0`和最後一個項目是在索引`Count-1`。Because the collection indexes are zero-based, the first element is at index `0` and the last element is at index `Count-1`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用索引子來擷取集合內，或將格式設定集合中的指定索引處的指定索引處的物件。Use the indexer to retrieve the object at the specified index within the collection or to set the format at the specified index within the collection. 您可以使用陣列標記法索引集合中的項目。You can index elements in the collection by using array notation. 例如，您可以建立索引的索引處的項目`i`加上標記法`AutoFormats(i)`如 Microsoft VisualBasic 或`AutoFormats[i]`C#。For example, you can index an element at index `i` with the notation `AutoFormats(i)` for Microsoft VisualBasic or `AutoFormats[i]` for C#. 當您擁有的參考物件，並需要在集合中，使用物件的索引方法。When you have a reference to the object and need the index of the object in the collection, use the method.

\- or -

span.span: Gets the maximum outer dimensions of the control as it will appear at run time.

span.span: A structure that contains the height and width of the control on the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性檢查集合中的每一個格式，並傳回最大高度和最大寬度結構。The property examines each format in the collection and returns the largest height and the largest width in a structure. 視覺化設計工具，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，會使用來決定的初始大小**自動格式設定** 對話方塊。A visual designer, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], uses the to determine the initial size of the **AutoFormat** dialog box. 最小大小為 200-200 像素。The minimum size is 200-by-200 pixels.

summary.span: 從集合中移除指定的 物件。

span.span: Removes the specified object from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法中移除第一個出現`format`從集合。The method removes the first occurrence of `format` from the collection. 如果物件不包含`format`，維持不變的集合。If the object does not contain `format`, the collection remains unchanged. 不會有例外狀況擲回。No exception is thrown. 方法會判斷等號比較使用方法比較的物件。The method determines equality by using the method on the objects that are being compared. 方法執行的線性搜尋; 因此，平均執行時間成比例值。The method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the value. 若要從集合中移除特定索引處的格式，使用方法。To remove a format at a particular index from the collection, use the method. 若要從集合中移除所有格式，請使用方法。To remove all formats from the collection, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 當您從集合移除項目時，集合中後續項目的索引值將會變更。When you remove an item from a collection, the index values change for subsequent items in the collection.

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不在本質上是安全執行緒程序列舉集合。Enumerating through a collection is not a thread-safe procedure intrinsically. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改集合。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection. 列舉型別造成例外狀況。This causes exceptions during enumeration. 使用中鎖定集合保證的執行緒安全，以在整個列舉過程的方法。Lock the collection by using the method during the entire enumeration to guarantee thread safety. 如需鎖定集合中的執行緒安全的存取詳細資訊，請參閱。For detailed information about locking collections for thread-safe access, see .
